DataElement.preferredName: Employment Past Fourteen Days Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes No indicator to signify whether the patient worked in the past 14 days

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary._Before the present time._A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A unit of measurement of time equal to 24 hours.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary.

Concepts.definition: The state of being engaged in an activity or service for wages or salary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Before the present time.:A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 13 and less than 15 and the quantity that it denotes.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Worked within the past 14 day
ReferenceDocuments.description: Worked within the past 14 days prior to screening (no minimum number of hours required)

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF 1802
ReferenceDocuments.description: Worked within the past 14 days prior to screening (no minimum number of hours required) OR (a) worked at some point between March 1, 2020-March 14, 2020 and (b) subsequently lost job involuntarily due to COVID-19
